item.description: One of the biggest problems in the field of oncology and cancer research in 2022 is lack of open data sharing from clinical outcomes databases that incorporate demographics, genomics, & therapeutics. Government, industry, professional societies & universities should address this. https://t.co/9bzMucJiEV

item.title: #nl @ 1482705585741209607
item.description: Op het vlak van (open-)data kan ik mij vinden in het voorstel in het #Wintermanifest. Geef de bevolking en pers de kans de ruwe data onafhankelijk te interpreteren, visualiseren en er over te berichten en analyseren. Meer transparantie vergroot het vertrouwen in besluitvorming. https://t.co/WAIPqg7HZ8

item.description: @istsupsan @borghi_claudio @claudiocerasa Scusate ma cosa si intende per "grezzi"? Intendete non aggregati? Potreste usare il lessico del mestiere per cortesia? item.title: #en @ 1482326701208391682
item.description:
Web1 vs Web2 vs Web3
Web1 Pro: Open web Con: Closed content (No UGC)
Web2 Pro: Open content (UGC enabled) Con: Closed data (data owned by companies)
Web3 Pro: Open data (data owned by users) Con: ?
